label: Disclosure of voting or investment power
summary: Bank of America Corporation (BAC) and its subsidiary, Banc of America Preferred Funding Corporation (BAPFC), filed a Schedule 13D reporting the acquisition of 350 Variable Rate Demand Preferred Shares (VRDP Shares) of BlackRock Municipal Credit Alpha Portfolio, Inc. BAPFC acquired these shares for approximately $35 million, resulting in the reporting persons collectively owning 100% of this class of securities. BAPFC assigned certain preferred class voting rights to a voting trust, while retaining other voting rights. Additionally, Bank of America, N.A. and BofA Securities, Inc. are involved in liquidity purchase obligations and remarketing agreements for the VRDP Shares.
